title: Raccoony
name: raccoony
description: Adds shiny new features (like automatic downloading) to art sites.
author: NatePri

preferences.name: downloadFolder
preferences.title: Download Folder
preferences.description: The folder where Raccoony will download art

preferences.name: tabLoadDelay
preferences.title: Open all delay
preferences.description: The delay for loading each submission when opening all submissions in tabs, in seconds.

preferences.name: tabLoadOrder
preferences.title: Open all order
preferences.description: The order tabs will be opened in, if Raccoony does not detect an explicit sorting order. Sorting by date requires incremental submission IDs and is not guaranteed to work.

preferences.name: showFullscreenOnLoad
preferences.title: Show fullscreen on load
preferences.description: Shows the image in fullscreen mode whenever a submission page loads.
